items.sentence: I think it\'d be better if you didn\'t do that.
The reason Tom got sick was because he overate.
There are a lot of French books in the library.
Tom and Mary looked at each other and stood up.
Tom carefully climbed up the rickety staircase.
Tom was the first person to offer to help Mary.
Tom was the last person I expected to see here.
Tom was the one who drove Mary to the hospital.
Tom was the one who taught me how to water ski.
Tom was very concerned about what might happen.
Tom was wearing a blue and white striped shirt.
I only had thirty dollars with me at that time.
I saw Tom pushing a stroller down the sidewalk.
Tom will be waiting for you when you get there.
Tom worked all day and was completely worn out.
I don\'t feel like eating Chinese food tonight.
I don\'t feel like going to the movies tonight.
I don\'t have a problem with anything you said.
I don\'t have anything to do with that problem.
I don\'t have time to deal with this right now.
